text: On the Avenue is a 1937 American musical comedy movie directed by Roy Del Ruth and starring Alice Faye, Dick Powell, Madeleine Carroll, George Barbier, The Ritz Brothers, Alan Mowbray. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1937 comedy movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Roy Del Ruth Category:Movies directed by William A. Seiter
title: On the Avenue
